channel.title: Removing Fire In Client?
channel.description:
How Do I Remove The Fire Out Of The Client?
[IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/fazgn5.jpg[/img]
I Want The Fire Circled In Yellow Gone..

item.title: Removing Fire In Client?
item.dc:creator: @Perses_Pkers Perses Pkers
item.description:
@Perses_Pkers wrote:

[quote=“Sanskrit, post:6, topic:370189”]Didn’ t read that this was PI, sorry. Heres what you do:
Search:

drawFlames

A private void will come up. Then change this:

try { long l = System.currentTimeMillis(); int i = 0; int j = 20; while(aBoolean831) { anInt1208++; calcFlamesPosition(); calcFlamesPosition(); doFlamesDrawing(); if(++i > 10) { long l1 = System.currentTimeMillis(); int k = (int)(l1 - l) / 10 - j; j = 40 - k; if(j < 5) j = 5; i = 0; l = l1; } try { Thread.sleep(j); } catch(Exception _ex) { } } } catch(Exception _ex) { } drawingFlames = false;

to this:

try { long l = System.currentTimeMillis(); int i = 0; int j = 20; while(aBoolean831) { anInt1208++; //calcFlamesPosition(); //calcFlamesPosition(); doFlamesDrawing(); if(++i > 10) { long l1 = System.currentTimeMillis(); int k = (int)(l1 - l) / 10 - j; j = 40 - k; if(j < 5) j = 5; i = 0; l = l1; } try { Thread.sleep(j); } catch(Exception _ex) { } } } catch(Exception _ex) { } drawingFlames = false;

Hope this helped :D[/quote]AHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH THANKS MAN REP ++ Thanks Again Man

Read full topic

item.title: Removing Fire In Client?
item.dc:creator: @Sanskrit Sanskrit
item.description:
@Sanskrit wrote:

Didn’ t read that this was PI, sorry. Heres what you do:
Search:

drawFlames

A private void will come up. Then change this:

try { long l = System.currentTimeMillis(); int i = 0; int j = 20; while(aBoolean831) { anInt1208++; calcFlamesPosition(); calcFlamesPosition(); doFlamesDrawing(); if(++i > 10) { long l1 = System.currentTimeMillis(); int k = (int)(l1 - l) / 10 - j; j = 40 - k; if(j < 5) j = 5; i = 0; l = l1; } try { Thread.sleep(j); } catch(Exception _ex) { } } } catch(Exception _ex) { } drawingFlames = false;

to this:

try { long l = System.currentTimeMillis(); int i = 0; int j = 20; while(aBoolean831) { anInt1208++; //calcFlamesPosition(); //calcFlamesPosition(); doFlamesDrawing(); if(++i > 10) { long l1 = System.currentTimeMillis(); int k = (int)(l1 - l) / 10 - j; j = 40 - k; if(j < 5) j = 5; i = 0; l = l1; } try { Thread.sleep(j); } catch(Exception _ex) { } } } catch(Exception _ex) { } drawingFlames = false;

Hope this helped
